 2004-13882004-11-23HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1242 - ERYTHRITOL) by making provision for the use of erythritol as a carrier for intense sweeteners in table-top sweeteners and as a sweetener in dietetic beverages, fat-based cream fillings and toppings, dietetic cookies and wafers, soft and hard candies, and in chewing gum.
